::Zardus/FZ::

The door to the torture chamber opens and FZ walks in, launcher aimed at Zardus' chest. Zardus's eyes open in surprise. Without moving his launcher, FZ pushes a button near the door and it closes.

"All right, don't move. I'm taking over. Release Wolfgang and put your gun down," FZ says sharply to Zardus, not noticing Nemesis, who was standing behind him.

Zardus opens his mouth to reply but FZ interrupts. "Don't say anything. I know you can bring up the defences with one word. You move and you die, Zardus. I suggest you cooperate," FZ says with an evil gleam in his eyes.
